# tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesLimit

### `tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesLimit`

``` python
BytesLimit()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py).

Generates an op that measures the total memory (in bytes) of a device.
